query:
CREATE TABLE defectInspections (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  defectId INT NOT NULL,
  inspectorId INT NOT NULL,
  inspectionType ENUM('initial', 'reinspection') NOT NULL,
  result ENUM('passed', 'failed', 'pending') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  comments TEXT,
  photoUrls TEXT,
  inspectedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_defect (defectId),
  INDEX idx_inspector (inspectorId),
  INDEX idx_inspection_date (inspectedAt)
);

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  defectId INT NOT NULL,
  inspectorId INT NOT NULL,
  inspectionType ENUM('initial', 'reinspection') NOT NULL,
  result ENUM('passed', 'failed', 'pending') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  comments TEXT,
  photoUrls TEXT,
  inspectedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_defect (defectId),
  INDEX idx_inspector (inspectorId),
  INDEX idx_inspection_date (inspectedAt)
);
